location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires, Tehran

mods.abstract: Riach informs Willock that Lieutenant-Colonel Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, had been forced by ill health to go to Bombay from Muscat, and that he (Riach) had taken over the duties of the Residency in his absence, or until further orders from the Government of Bombay.
